OOC: In the base.

RHESUS(like the kind of monkey):Yeh I hope Mustex is o.k=
.  He lacks 
the piece of mind not to have fired that shot.

Stallex gets a=
 look of horror which Rhesus spot.

Rhesus: No my son.  You must not go.

S=
tallex:  I'M NOT YOUR SON I'M HIS(not biologically he's just always 
been a=
 role model and he's called Dad by Stallex I always feel like I 
haven't ma=
de that clear enough)!  AND HE'S NOT DIEING WITHOUT ME!

He hops on his bik=
e and takes off.  Rhesus shakes his head in 
something of a Chinese manor.
=

Rhesus:  Foolish child if only he did not follow in the footsteps of 
that=
 fool Mustex.
